pages.text: Right clicking on most species of sapling with a Raw Soul will transform it, turning it transparent and with a blue color scheme. Listening closely enough, one might be able to hear whispers coming from the young plant.

The plant slowly absorbs souls from small organisms in the soil it is planted upon, using light energy to do so. If allowed to mature, this plant will grow into a tree with transparent wood and leaves. The leaves have an interesting property, sometimes dropping ectoplasm, and less commonly, Raw Souls.
The saplings are rather unstable, attempting to pick one up will cause it to morph into significantly less valuable ectoplasm.
